question: Match List-I with List-II:
List-I (Types of redox reactions): a. Combination, b. Decomposition, c. Displacement, d. Disproportionation
List-II (Examples):
i. Cl2 + 2Br- -> 2Cl- + Br2
ii. 2H2O2 -> 2H2O + O2
iii. CH4 + 2O2 -> CO2 + 2H2O
iv. 2H2O -> 2H2 + O2
explanation: a. Combination: CH4 + 2O2 -> CO2 + 2H2O (Combustion/Combination type in this context) [iii]
